titleInfo.title: The interplay of modern myths about sexual aggression and moral foundations in the blaming of rape victims

mods.abstract: We provide the complete, labeled SPSS dataset of the paper Milesi, P., Süssenbach, P., Bohner, G., & Megías, J. L. (2020). The interplay of modern myths about sexual aggression and moral foundations in the blaming of rape victims. *European Journal of Social Psychology, 50*(1), 111-123.

originInfo.publisher: European Journal of Social Psychology. Wiley Publishers.
